title: Close Out a Grant
description: A non-profit has completed its grant-funded project and is submitting its final report to close out the grant.

tasks.description: Receive the final grant report, including a summary of outcomes and final financial statements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The grant manager receives the complete closeout package.

tasks.description: Review the report to ensure all grant requirements and objectives were met.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager confirms the non-profit has met all its obligations.

tasks.description: Process the final payment, if any, and officially close the grant in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager approves the final report and updates the grant status to 'Closed'.
